youCanCreatePersonalPage: website, you can create a personal page for medical institution, including.
opportunityOfPosting: an opportunity of posting an article in the News section of doctors.am
anInterview: an interview (visit of journalist and preparation of interview)
registrationCosts: Registration of personal page costs 60.000 AMD per year.
sendAinfoAbout: You can also send information about the medical institution to info@doctors.am e-mail, and our staff will kindly register it on our website.
anyProblem: Should you have any problem and question regarding registration, please, call
